99122
Test: public void shouldNotAcceptNullInAllAnyPrimitiveWrapperMatchers() { when(mock.forInteger(anyInt())).thenReturn("0"); when(mock.forCharacter(anyChar())).thenReturn("1"); when(mock.forShort(anyShort())).thenReturn("2"); when(mock.forByte(anyByte())).thenReturn("3"); when(mock.forBoolean(anyBoolean())).thenReturn("4"); when(mock.forLong(anyLong())).thenReturn("5"); when(mock.forFloat(anyFloat())).thenReturn("6"); when(mock.forDouble(anyDouble())).thenReturn("7"); }
Code: public static short anyShort() { return reportMatcher(new InstanceOf(Short.class)).returnZero(); }
